body: kinda sad that the girl left...

will you make the guy proportionate to the girls in the future chapters ? I don't have huge girl and small guy fetish
The vampire and the maid is a different story
These peeps too quick to jump to conclusions lmao

The last story is from one of the author's other works. They are not the same women as the vampire sensei and student council president. The other title for the women from the final story is takusan meshiagare goshujin-sama

I'd like to think that the two maids are different than the two in the main story. For the black-haired one, there's the name: Risa for the maid and Rinko for the president. Also, the president has a beauty mark under her left eye, while the maid does not. The blonde-haired one is a bit harder to say if there's any difference, but I think I have it. Of course there's the name change, with Alicia for the maid and Akame for the teacher. Now, the teacher could be the same person, but i think that if only one of the two main females remained, then it wouldn't make much sense. That's why i think those are two different people compared to the two in the main story.
